flows.title: Quick Demo Request for Employer
flows.description: An employer or health plan representative quickly wants to book a demo to understand Goodbill's solutions for plans.
browser_actions: Click on the 'Book a demo' button prominently displayed in the hero section.

flows.title: Employer Researching Specific Plan Solutions
flows.description: A meticulous employer representative wants to understand the details of Goodbill's specific offerings (501(r) discounts, claim reviews, member experience) before considering a demo.
user_goals: Determine if a demo is worthwhile
browser_actions: From the main navigation (or 'Solutions' menu), click the link to '501(r) Discounts'.
From the main navigation (or 'Solutions' menu), click the link to 'Claim Reviews'.
From the main navigation (or 'Solutions' menu), click the link to 'Member Experience'.
Click on the 'Book a demo' button (likely from the main navigation or footer).

flows.title: Patient Seeking Hospital Bill Negotiation Services
flows.description: An individual patient who has received a hospital bill wants to find out how Goodbill can help them negotiate it.
user_goals: Understand how to submit a bill for negotiation
browser_actions: In the 'Got a hospital bill?' section, click the 'We help you negotiate, too' link.

flows.title: General User Checking FAQs
flows.description: A general user, potentially a prospective client or patient, wants to find quick answers to common questions about Goodbill's services, process, or company.
browser_actions: Scroll to the website footer and click the 'FAQ' link.

flows.title: Mobile User Registering for Webinar
flows.description: A user on a mobile device, interested in educational content about hospital discounts, wants to register for an upcoming webinar.
browser_actions: Navigate to `https://www.goodbill.com` on a mobile browser.
Tap the hamburger menu icon (if present) to open the mobile navigation.
Tap on 'Book a demo' from the navigation menu.
Scroll down on the Demo page to locate the 'Upcoming webinar!' section.
Tap the 'Register for' link associated with the webinar 'Intro to 501(r): The Hospital Discount Hiding in Plain Sight'.
